name: Kama Sutra Currency #4
description:
All in a typical dark Copy Planet climate. 

These coins represent a contemplation of desire, dreams, disruption and currency. The series syncretizes 3 divergent concepts of the “Kama Sutra” “the Mandala" and “Cryptocurrency”. 

The context of this gesture highlights the parallel idea shared between the of the 3 concepts which is the line/thread/blockchain. 

It represents the dreamer's search for completeness and self-unity, representing a blending and evolution of a new spirituality needed for a new paradigm where desire, dreams and currency converge in a decentralized sphere. 

Cooked by collaborating with artist Pablo Salafurka. 

Words by James Ly
